Categories

for use with functions that require input from more than one grim instance

grim_select_help_event
routine in grim_menus_include.pro

it is useful in cases where multiple grim instances are running in multiple idl sessions

grim_identify_help_event
routine in grim_menus_include.pro

nv/gr operation: this option causes grim to print a message on the idl command line

grim_identify_help_event
routine in grim_menus_include.pro

nv/gr operation: this option toggles a given grim instance between selected and unselected states

grim_select_help_event
routine in grim_menus_include.pro

this button displays an asterisk

grim_select_help_event
routine in grim_menus_include.pro

when a given instance is selected

grim_select_help_event
routine in grim_menus_include.pro
